Exercise 6
item.description: Constructed Narrative When the contents of a photograph have been artificially created by the artist in some way to reflect a narrative, rather than simply photographing a real scene.

item.description: Camera and Mic highlights the relationship between digital media and our physical senses.

item.description: A Pure Glitch is an effect either produced without intention or without understanding the underlying cause and system.
